title: LF a 5 man Ranked Queue team
body:
hey guys i am looking for plat+ ranked queue add me if interested

can play till we get diamond :)

replies.body:
Hey i'm currently gold 4, however have climbed up from b3 over the last month (only just resumed playing in october last year, shit i even have a graph of my climb over the beginning of this season http://i.imgur.com/UxRehiu.png). I'm a top main however i play jungle as and when needed (Depending on team comp and champion pools i rotate between the two). Have a no flame or blame attitude, and very dedicated to climbing up with a team.

HMU if you'd like to give me a shot.

IGN: Doctor Jekyll
